caption: In a castle, a woman held a wine glass, her body trembling with fear. Beside her was a young girl, to whom the woman was recounting past events, seemingly attempting to alleviate her own terror through speech. Meanwhile, outside the castle, upon the seas, an army was attempting to make landfall on ships. The city's defenders were visibly panicked. They launched rockets at the invaders, but these failed to repel them. The invaders successfully landed and began an assault on the city gates. Chaos ensued. The defenders' commander was doing his utmost to halt the advancing forces.
